name: Skill Drop
description:
Skill Drop is a fun little puzzle game where you have to abandon your abilities in order to progress! Use them to reach higher platforms, cover spikes, and more!

Press escape while in a level to return to the level select screen.

Skill Drop was made in under 72 hours for MiniJam 65 with the theme "Abandoned". Stay tuned for a post-jam version with more levels, new mechanics, and cute music!

Made using the LÖVE Framework (License) · Web version packaged using LÖVE Web Builder
